remarks: Alternate proof of ~ nbgraop using ~ mpt2xopoveq , but being longer. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 7-Oct-2017.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nbgraopALT $p |- ( ( ( V e. Y /\ E e. Z ) /\ N e. V ) -> ( <. V , E >. Neighbors N ) = { n e. V | { N , n } e. ran E } ) $.
$d E n $.
$d E n $.
$d N n $.
$d N n $.
$d V n $.
$d V n $.
